title: Premiere: Thief – Cry Me A River (Demo)
body:
You might need to sit down for this one.

Australian-based artist PJ Wolf, aka Thief, has been pleasing audiophiles with his anthemic take on electronic music for months now and today we got our hands on a gem that’s guaranteed to set-off your Friday night. The Justin Timberlake cover ditches all restraint in favor of triumphant trumpets and island sounds–effectively turning brass into bass. What more could you possibly want?!

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/147533391?secret\_token=s-xfsBV” params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]
